          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Priestley's experiment</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Experiment Priestleys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'expérience de Priestley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiência de Priestley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimento del Priestley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πείραμα Priestley</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimento de Priestley</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that plants produce and give off oxygen using sunlight and carbon dioxide.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Carbon dioxide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">photosynthesis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß Betriebe Sauerstoff 
mit Tageslicht und Kohlendioxyd produzieren und abgeben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme prouve que les usines produisent et 
dégagent l'oxygène en utilisant la lumière du soleil et l'anhydride
carbonique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que as plantas produzem e 
dão fora do oxigênio usando a luz solar e o dióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che le piante producono ed 
emanano l'ossigeno usando la luce solare e l'anidride carbonica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι οι εγκαταστάσεις 
παράγουν και εκπέμπουν το οξυγόνο χρησιμοποιώντας το φως του 
ήλιου και το διοξείδιο του άνθρακα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que las plantas producen y 
emiten el oxígeno usando luz del sol y el bióxido de carbono.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
